Posts.EditableText: To get all or "packages" of adventures. Is this possible?
Posts.HTML: To get all or "packages" of adventures. Is this possible?

Posts.EditableText:
I'm not sure, but I think it's an excellent idea to make that an option.  Not sure what it would take on Quest's end, but it'd be neat if there was a package of recommended games or highly rated games that could be grouped together.  But, it may be easier for the gamer to select them themselves and download them individually.  It takes about zero time to
Download a game, but certainly this is worth considering.  Right?
